channel.title: PS3 to be better then XBox360?
channel.description:
Please tell us which new game console you think well be better and why. Ps3 is coming out November 17.
Which do you think you well get the better buy?
I personally think the ps3 well be better, including from what I've seen on magazines, tv shows, and game convensions ect. It looks like they are improving their online feature to "beast" the xbox's, which is a double plus because it remains free :p Graphics look way better then the xbox 360, even the graphics card allows it to have so much more possibilitys such as 3d grass on madden 07.

item.title: PS3 to be better then XBox360?

item.description:
@L_s_R wrote:

XBOX 360! no doubt…they are SO much better, especially with Live, but i’d wait a lil till thye wokr out some tweaks it don’t turn off sometimes!

item.title: PS3 to be better then XBox360?
item.dc:creator: @shpoanator shpoanator
item.description:
@shpoanator wrote:

I totally disagree with history here. Xbox360 sucks it should be last. It’s hard to put PC anywhere in there since it’s not a game console. Wii and DS are really good. The PSP could be considered a computer since you can listen to music, wathc videos, etc. PS3 is going to be really good and definatly better then xbox360. Xbox360 should be th elast in that list.

item.description:

PS3 > 360

And it’ll be expensive because all the new consoles are getting more similar to the computer each time a new one comes out.
[/quote]

Umm the consoles are all ready better than computers… a computer couldn’t process graphics like the ones on PS3 which are better than real life (IMO)

PS3 WILL own and people are already playing on it right now! But crappy europe has to wait till next march! WTF is that ma nigga!?[/quote]

HAHA Noob

I’m getting my Wii in 13 Days…

item.title: PS3 to be better then XBox360?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

The PSP isnt really trying to beat the DS well they are but like the PSP is more of a competition with the iPod because it does really focus on the game play like the DS …

403,435 DS’s 153,353 PSP’s … thats almost 3 times as much… and the PS2 outsold the Xbox by almost 60,000…

IDK the end of the year Nintendo will have made over a billion dollars on Wii sales and about probally millions more with the DS …

Read full topic
item.source: PS3 to be better then XBox360?

item.title: PS3 to be better then XBox360?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:21343”][quote author=Salemthegoodkitty link=topic=31993.msg381000#msg381000 date=1162355480]

ps3 by far:

ps3 has 50gb games, thats a shit load of space for storing game data
has 8 processors
has free online play
you can download games and share with up to 5 other people
when you rotate the controller it senses it and is a nice feature for games, like turning in a car.
*you can watch high definition movies

NEWSFLASH DOUCHEBAG PS3 IS GONNA BE A FUCKING FORTUNE WITHOUT THE HARDDRIVE!

I believe it was about 600 or so… Not that bad. In a year that’ll go down to like 400 or less I bet.

that still is quite a lot of money…
[/quote]
you are so ignorant, have you even looked at the features of the ps2? no shit its expensive, thats cause its so good, we arent arguing which costs more, we are arguing which is better, and even with $600 price tag that is because its the first release (which isnt much more than xbox’s price) and you also get free networked play (which xbox charges for) and waaaay better play quality[/quote]

Rofl dont expect the PS3 price to go down in a while and dont expect PS4 in about 5-8 years…Nintendo will make a console in probally 4-5 years…And IDK about Microsoft there not selling that many XBOX 360’s…

September's NPD U.S. game sale stats just hit and man do they look ugly for the Playstation Portable.

From August 29 to September 30 403,435 DSes were sold, but only 153,353 Playstation Portables were picked up. Everything wasn’t grim for Sony though, the Playstation 2 once again outsold the Xbox 360, 306,517 versus 259,458.

Hit the jump for the break-down of top software sales for the month

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 to be better then XBox360?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

The Wii is going to be $200 (£150)

I got the pre-order.

As far as pricing issues, for all of you who said the Wii would release for $199, give yourselves a good pat on the back. Apparently, Nintendo wanted to price the Wii at £150 and $200, in the United Kingdom and the U.S. respectively, but were under pressure to increase the amount from larger retail chains, which expressed concerns over margins and low “basket-value” (The amount of revenue generated from a customer’s overall purchases).
